RDF allows UTF 8 characters for URIs
- RDF allows UTF-8 characters for URIs
- But, Linked Data URIs has to be URLs as well
- So, non ASCII-US characters have to be %code
• http://geo.linkeddata.es/ontology/R%C3%ADo
